                    Text: 
                    Methamphetamine



COMMON & BRAND NAMES

Meth; Speed; Crystal; Crank; Tweak; Yaba; Glass; Sisa; DesoxynÂ®

EFFECTS CLASSIFICATION

Euphoric Stimulant

CHEMICAL NAME

d-N-methylamphetamine

DESCRIPTION

Methamphetamine is a strong physical and mental stimulant available in both prescription and street forms. It is relatively easy to synthesize which has contributed to its widespread use.

BASICS

EFFECTS

IMAGES

HEALTH

LAW

DOSE
